name: background_layout
objective: Layout of Background tab is correctly organised
description:
In the 'Background' tab of home screen settings, 5 elements must be visible :
- a file browser on top left part of the window
- a wallpaper thumbnails on the middle left part of the window
- a +/- icon bellow the wallpaper thumbnails
- a color picker area right side of the +/- button
- a large preview area on the right part of the window
pre_condition:
- open the homescreen settings panel (user menu -> settings -> gnome-control-center opens -> click on home screen settings icon)
- select the "Background" tab

steps.expected: a file browser on top left part of the window
a wallpaper thumbnails on the middle left part of the window
a +/- icon bellow the wallpaper thumbnails
a color picker area right side of the +/- button
a large preview area on the right part of the window

author: sdx
